options.content: # IMPORTANT After each change please export this dashboard as JSON and update it in component-appcat repository

targets.expr: topk(1, sum(avg by (service) (minio_cluster_capacity_usable_total_bytes{cluster_id="$cluster",container="minio"})) by (service)) - topk(1, sum(avg by (service) (minio_cluster_capacity_usable_free_bytes{cluster_id="$cluster",container="minio"})) by (service))

panels.description: Number of online drives per MinIO Server
panels.title: Syscalls
